attributes.action: Make First-aid part of the school curriculum
attributes.additional_details: The NHS waste £2 billion on unnecessary appointments yet nearly two-thirds  within the UK would not feel confident enough to even try and save a life. we should be helping the UK, not wasting money and time that we do not have. Not only will compulsory First-aid improve the knowledge of students it will also help the community as a whole. Students would also feel more prepared in emergency situations rather than panicking and simply waiting for help.
attributes.background: First aid would be practical for young people as It is a useful life skill and will benefit them in future. St Johns ambulance stated that 140000 people die each year in incidents where first aid could have made the difference.
